summary: The state of Texas is divided into 254 counties.
full_text: Henry Lawrence Kinney was born in Pennsylvania, US on June 3, 1814. In 1838 Kinney moved to Texas and settled near where Brownsville, Texas is today. He served in both houses of the Texas Legislature. He was killed in a gunfight in Mexico on March 3, 1862.
title: Henry Lawrence Kinney
